Package local.intranet.tombola.api.controller

Class TombolaController

java.lang.Object
local.intranet.tombola.api.controller.TombolaController
@RestController @ConditionalOnExpression("${tombola.app.tombolaRest}") @RequestMapping("${spring.data.rest.basePath:/api}/v1/tombola") public class TombolaController extends Object
TombolaController for TombolaApplication It's for charge of rest pages

      @PatchMapping(value="/prize/prizeId/{prizeId}/prizeName/{prizeName}", produces="application/json") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_managerRole\', \'ROLE_adminRole\')") public PrizeInfo patchPrizeName(@PathVariable Long prizeId, @PathVariable String prizeName)

      Accessible to the RoleType.MANAGER_ROLE and RoleType.ADMIN_ROLE
